abstract: Activists and leading Vietnam War scholars call on Defense Dept to correct interactive website timeline commemorating conflict's 50th anniversary, saying it glosses over events that inspired protests, and liken it to propaganda; officials say they hope new version of site makes up for shortcomings.
lead_paragraph: For two years, a committee has been seeking changes to what it calls a rose-colored portrayal of the conflict on a website commemorating its 50th anniversary.

headline.main: Activists Call for Realistic Portrayal of Vietnam War on a Pentagon Website
headline.print_headline: Activists Call for Realistic Portrayal of Vietnam War on a Pentagon Website
